title: Chicken Vegetable and Rice Soup
ingredients: ['1.2 litres water', '415ml chicken stock', '1 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into cubes', '3 carrots, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '2 cubes chicken stock', '65g uncooked white rice', 'salt and pepper to taste']
